markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs=""
>
[Fanged](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1433)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 106</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a melee weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When etched with this rune, a weapon's hilt or haft becomes engraved with grooves that match the imprints of a wolf's teeth. By putting a _fanged_ weapon in your mouth, you can transform into an animal.

<document level="2" id="action-1081" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs="Standard"
>
Fanged
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 106</row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Fanged (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 106</row>

**Price** 425 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

In animal form, you gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416) and a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Fanged (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 106</row>

**Price** 6,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

In animal form, you gain low-light vision, imprecise scent to a range of 30 feet, and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed.
name: Fanged (Major)
